data.title: "I'm so proud of her achievements so far" - Kunle Afolayan says as he celebrates daughter Eyiyemi (Video)
data.meta_description: "I'm so proud of her achievements so far" - Kunle Afolayan says as he celebrates daughter Eyiyemi (Video)
data.text:
- Advertisement -

Nigerian film producer, Kunle Afolayan, has celebrated his first child Eyiyemi Afolayan over her remarkable journey as a renowned actress in the movie industry.

Kunle Afolayan, beaming with pride, took to his Instagram page as he shared a video capturing interview of Eyiyemi with Channels TV.

It is worth noting that the Afolayan princess, born on September 11th 2005, made her debut appearance at 2022 award-winning film, Anikulapo, captivating audiences with her standout performance. She also featured in the six-part epic of the film, Anikulapo: Rise of the Spectre.

- Advertisement -

ATTENTION: Intel Region is ₦10,000 to our top readers, CLICK HERE to become a winner

Taking to his timeline, he took pride in his daughter, whom he called Princess Omowunmi from her script name in his new movie, Anikulapo Series The Rise of Spectre. He noted how though she is still a work in progress, however, he is proud of her achievements so far.

He wrote, “My daughter Eyitemi aka Princess Omowunmi is a work in progress but I am proud of her achievements so far”.

Taking to his comment section, the 18-year-old movie star appreciated her father of her upbringing. She wrote, “Thank you for the upbringing Baba mi”.

Watch the video below:

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Kunle Afolayan (@kunleafo)

- Advertisement -

Fans and friends across the Nollywood industry thronged to comment section to share their thoughts. Some reactions are shown below:

debukkie01 said, “She looks so much like aunty Moji Afolayan… The hair, the brows… The resemblance is too much❤️”.

lydiaforson said, “Wow! I still remember meeting her as a little girl. She’s grown up so beautifully. ?”.

blingzz__ said, “She’s sooooooooooo preetttty?God bless you?”.

beeholar__ said, “Lion no dey born goat na❤️❤️❤️”.

officialadesanyatoyosi said, “Thank you for the fatherly role @kunleafo”.

- Advertisement -

cukiesbrown_ said, “I love her name “Eyiyemi”?”.

ronkkybebe said, “My darling Eyi yem….yem?Greater heights darling ❤️”.

tundekomolafe said, “Solid improvement in this series ?”.
